pages.text: Made with complex magicks, these wands can perform very useful magical tasks. I can fashion a wand by creating a mystical wand base, and then combining it with some materials and runic magic within the runic table.

The Mystical Wand Base is the primary component for all mystical wands. This powerful wand requires high-magic woods. I must seek out wood that's highly magical and craft it with a vis shard in the runic table.
Imbued with the magic of air and ender, this wand casts a homing projectile that finds and hits nearby foes.
